Review.Titre: If I could rate zero stars I would.
Review.Contenu: If I could rate zero stars, I would. A compete waste of time and money. I've been dealing with their customer service for over 5 months for several products missing from multiple orders and getting nowhere. I've been told multiple times that the products will be sent the day of the emails back, and never receive any sort of tracking. Save your time and money and just order from another retailer.

Review.Titre: No charger received with lightsaber after months waiting
Review.Contenu: I never received my charger for my lightsaber and I have asked them personally multiple times through messenger on Facebook and they reply how sorry they are every time but never send it. Without a charger I can’t even use my lightsaber and I’ve had it since February 2023. I’ve been patient for months with multiple messages before finally leaving this review. Don’t trust DX Sabers if they say they will do something.

Review.Titre: Ordered A light saber and and it's came…
Review.Contenu: Ordered A light saber and and it came in peices and when I turned it on it started smoking. Dx sabers are a scam drop shippers and the dx brand is hilts that are broken or rejects or returns and Paul makes his own sabers out of hot glue.  Took almost a year and my bank is opening a fraud lawsuit against dx sabers.  Avoid if you like money

In my OPINION I would tell everyone that is looking to buy a lightsaber: DO NOT EVER PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM DX SABERS.I made my initial purchase on May 25 of 2023. I was told the saber will be shipped in 7-10 days. I was then informed that the shipping time would be increased by 2 more weeks.The 2 weeks went by and I did not receive any updates from Dx Sabers. I sent a few e:mails asking for an update to the status of my order and silence has been their reply.This situation has continued for the past 7 months.My e:mail requests are rarely answered, their promises or never fulfilled and I have been waiting to receive my refund for 4 months.I have sent 76 professionally worded e:mails and have received only 12 replies.Today i discovered that my e:mail capability has been blocked by Dx Sabers. I am no longer able to send an e:mail or reply to any previous e:mails.In my OPINION Dx Sabers is a dishonest company concerned only with taking your money and leaving their customers out to dry.

I want to thank the people at Dxsabers for responding to my review of their company.In the response Dxsabers states that my refund was deposited on November 30th. They had asked for my Venmo account and stated in the second paragraph that the monies would be deposited in this account on November 30.Today is December 1st. and I have yet to see the refund deposited in my Venmo account.This is exactly why I cannot give Dxsabers a rating any higher than 1.Ron,Thank you so much for reaching outWe have been letting you know that the date for your scheduled refund was November 30th, and that you did not have to send us 4 emails per day as we would reach out to you when the time came for us to refund you.We really appreciate it and if you could check your account you should see the amount has been refunded and we do really appreciate the feedback whether positive or negative.We are going to use the feedback to become a better company and to do a better job for each one of our customers to the best of our ability.Ron, despite the way you feel we are truly here for you and please email us if you need anything or have any issues as we are always here to help.The same goes for anyone who reads this review as we are always here for our customers no matter what happens.May the force be with you always, Ron, and we hope you are having an awesome day!

Review.Titre: Still waiting for a really long time….
Review.Contenu: Hello everyone,   Unfortunately I am still waiting for my sabers since May 4th. It is with a heavy heart that the saber I purchased was for my nephew who was a very big Star Wars fan passed away. Never received his saber till this day I am still waiting that way his brother can put it on his mantle that he made. Hopefully I can receive them soon.

Absolute scam, don't buy from these guys. After reading all the bad reviews, I was worried my saber was never going to arrive (ordered in November), I still haven't got it. It got my money back through the creditcard company, DX sabers started sending me emails saying that I would get my saber if I payed additional shipping costs (3 months after the order). Please don't let these guys scam you for your money.

Review.Titre: Saber has not been delivered since 2…
Review.Contenu: Saber has not been delivered since 2 years and 10 months ago when it was ordered. Constant emails recycling through excuses saying the hilt is on hand and waiting for the cores, then email stating cores on hand and waiting for the hilt to arrive in stock. Two messages stating it was shipped, one instance the shipper hasn't gotten the package from Dx Sabers and the other time they avoid communications and block all social media contacts. Worst customer service for a product costing $400.

Gosh.  It started so well.  Very kind and attentive customer service then I was completely ghosted. One month after making the order I received my money back yet a promise they have been posted, reassuring messages......Followed by being completely ignored. My boys were so disappointed. I think this company is very overwhelmed with orders so perhaps find somewhere else if you a re looking for a reliable company.

Review.Titre: No repair, no recommendation. Total Scam.
Review.Contenu: Ordered a neopixel Wrath of Kylo Ren lightsaber back in March of 2021, stopped working entirely within 2 weeks. Sounds wouldn't turn on and saber connection became corrupted. I waited VERY PATIENTLY for the past year on repairs after mailing back this item and I continue to have excuse after excuse on why my item hasn't been repaired or replaced. Never buying from them again. Waste of $400.

Review.Titre: I ordered and paid for a saber in…
Review.Contenu: I ordered and paid for a saber in November 2020 as a Christmas present for our son, I received a DHL shipping advice soon after, but months later nothing was delivered so I contacted DX Sabers, thus began a litany of lies, they said it was with DHL, I had to track down the correct DHL dept who said it was never picked up from DX Sabers, then they offered a refund, I’m still waiting for the money, over 2 years later. They just keep lying to their customer, very unethical and untrustworthy. I will keep reviewing them to warn others to stay away from DX Sabers. I can see so many others have been scammed as well. You reap what you sow…

Absolute garbage. No respect for their customers. Nothing was sent on time; to two weeks to receive a bulb with no electrical components and no coupling to connect the hilts. You've messed with cosplayers for far too long and it's time you finally get taken down.

Totally horrible experience! $300 for a Saber that showed up with pieces coming off of it and another loose. No instructions. When I finally got it working it was on for less than 5 minutes and I could smell plastic burning. Discovered the light was melting the blade. As soon as I sent photos and videos to customer service they ghosted me. Son BIG time disappointed since we bought it to have signed by Ewan McGregor next week in Boston. Total failure!

Just don’t do it. They will send generic emails when asked about orders saying “I am so sorry from the bottom of my hart” they will create a shipping label but will not ship anything. They will not offer a refund because they “used the money already “. Just do yourself a favor and buy from a different ccompany.

Please, PLEASE, read others’ reviews and experience with this company. I’ve never had a company take hundreds of dollars from me just to be completely rude and dishonest to a degree. It took nearly a year of begging to get my sabers or money, just to be blown off and disrespected constantly, if they respond at all. Once my sabers finally arrived, they were of such poor quality, I didn’t even bother sending it back to them for repairs. You deserve so much better with your money. There’s so many amazing people and companies in the saber community, this is not one.
My orders from May 2023 that  I fully paid over 300 for my sabers.Have been delayed but they keeping me in the loop which I truly appreciate. I will update when I receive them with pictures.

Review.Titre: I recommend choosing a different company
Review.Contenu: I ordered two sabers Nov. 2021 and have not received my purchase after ten months, all my emails would be met with reassurance that turned out to be direct lies, such as saying my sabers would ship within the week while not even having the product on hand, and Instagram messages were often met with verbal abuse. I have not contacted them in about four months and have received no updates, automated or otherwise, regarding my order. Meanwhile, I purchased a lightsaber from a different company and received it less than ten days after purchasing. I am not sure how they decide who gets their orders and who doesn't, but clearly they decided I would be left empty-handed.

By far one of the worst companies I've ever dealt with. Product Delivery was delayed with no updates, when I did talk to customer service they were rude. When I finally received the product the quality was not what was advertised. I would highly recommend avoiding this company and all of there products.

Where do I begin ? This company is dishonest and now I learned why NO ONE in the saber community shops with this brand. To start off the neopixel builds are super cheap with really low quality batteries. I’ve had two sabers malfunction, it took over a year to upgrade/replace one, and the other didn’t make it back. I sent a neopixel blade and chassis in for repair and was told that my items were “lost” or “stolen”, and the owner basically played me on DMs and tried to get me to buy another saber. After my second purchase completely malfunctioning and waiting 2 months, I am back to give this 1 star review, and advise anyone to NOT shop with DX Sabers. The experience has been horrible, the owner is a liar. I would never do business with them again. Not a chance.

Terrible company, do NOT order from them!I placed an order for one of their pre-made sabers over a year ago. I have yet to receive an order. Minimal communication, I had to reach out to them constantly for order updates. No tracking information, no offers for refund, nothing!They even had the gall to demand 75% of the purchase price back under 'restocking fees' when I asked for a refund! If you're in the market for a quality lightsaber, go elsewhere.Even worse, sending out a response on here attempting to make a customer out as the unreasonable party, outright falsifying information regarding conversations involving the order in question. No, you've never "done right by me" as a customer. I requested a refund for non-delivery of goods on an order you haven't filled in 14 months. You refused.

After a long delivery time our saber finally arrived late for Christmas 2021. The arrival was mainly due to my chasing and although it was promised to arrive pre-Christmas it finally arrived after the big day leaving my son without his main present. Upon receiving the saber all seemed fine, until it broke within 48hrs. After many emails we agreed to a refund after sending the saber back (at great expense) , the refund has not arrived as yet. After they said my refund had been issued (through a third party) they then had the cheek to ask if I would leave a 5 star rating on trust pilot. Here is My rating.Under no circumstances should you part with your hard earned money to this company. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!

Review.Titre: Horrible customer service across the board
Review.Contenu: Not to mention the shipping time is horrible, which I can get by, but the customer service is horrific. I ordered 2 sabers, both broke down and stopped working out of nowhere. Sent them in for repairs in July 2021. It's now mid June 2022 and still haven't received them back. They told me they would arrive in May, it's now mid June. Haven't heard anything back despite multiple emails asking for updates. Do not buy from here. Sure, the prices are great and the quality of the sabers are actually pretty good, but the customer service experience I've received is the worst I've ever encountered with any company I've bought stuff from. STAY AWAY.

I cannot recommend DX Sabers. I spent $400 a year ago and haven’t received my order. They keep pushing the date back every time I ask about when I can expect my order. Maybe I should have put in a dispute with my bank, but I didn’t because I trusted them. Now I regret that. Please be warned this could happen to you. Update: Today is 26-Oct-2023, they’ve replied, to this review, but they haven’t sent me any emails about where my sabers are.

Horrible customer service. I’ve been waiting on my order for 2 years, they stopped responding to my emails. They’re trying to just bury me. I paid them 700$ for some sabers and have just been played. They won’t give me my money or my order. I’ve been patient until now. I would never recommend this company to anyone. Beware when buying from dxsabers. You may or may not get your order.

I ordered my saber (order #859) over 6 months ago, while customer service are always polite they are over all completely unhelpful and I have still not received my saber and have been told they are not giving out refunds, only store credit, which for obvious reason I do not want. Do not buy from this company, they cannot be trusted.

Review.Titre: This is an update on my original bad…
Review.Contenu: This is an update on my original bad review on Paul, the unethical scumbag owner who has no qualms in taking innocent people's hard earned money, including lots of young children's money & never sends anything. I ordered & paid in November 2020, but received nothing. Then come the many many excuses & lies upon lies that it was send & contact DHL, then when you get to the bottom of it, DHL advises it was never collected from scumbag Paul, then they spew more lies, then he says he will refund it, but never does. I am in the process of starting legal action against the most immoral person I have dealt with, on principal. He thinks he can keep scamming people & get away with it, very arrogant attitude, it will not end well for you Paul.

I'm posting a review to help others make better informed decisions before purchasing anything from this company. My husband has posted a review about our experience meeting and dealing with this company and everything there is 100% true and correct. We did not receive any proper and functional products from DXSabers and the experience overall feels like a scam 100%. Our only good experience from purchasing sabers for our entire family came from another company at this event that also helped us with our issues with DX products. The fact that they had to give us entirely different sabers that actually work properly and are assembled correctly shows that there are great companies out there that do care about us. DXSabers is not one of them and the owner is a liar and a thief that will not respond to emails. We support all of the reviews here that show them for what they are.

Literal garbage. Ordered the Ahsoka sabers set and the install was so shoddy. After months of being told they will be shipped by end of the month and no sabers, I was so excited to finally get them. But they barely function. Incredibly disappointing. Do not do business with this company. Complete scam.

Review.Titre: I would give it no stars if I could
Review.Contenu: I would give it no stars if I could. I ordered the hatred of ren on January 19th 2021, still to this day I have not received the produced I purchased and ordered. I've had emails back and forth with their "so called" costumer service, literally every single email they sent me was another excuse why I haven't recieved my saber. My last email from them was on the 12th of December 2022 stating that it will be shipped that week and arrive before Christmas. Well I'm sure you know what happened. I wrote them another email and never heard nothing from them. I recommend saving your money and spending it with an actual reputable dealer. You will only lose your money to them if you purchase anything. Also what "professional" business runs out of a run down home in Pennsylvania, don't believe me, just Google map their location and see for yourself.

Review.Titre: Extremely slow, meh quality, questionable practices
Review.Contenu: My personal experience, they are extremely slow, you have to constantly email them to stay on top of your order. The quality of the hilts are not great. To clarify, the electronics are really cool but the hilts came with missing screws or screws that didn't fit causing the blades to be very lose. Even when I requested new/more screws, they also didn't fit and took months to even receive them along with the rest of my order that they seemingly ran out of to send.If you are someone who is very patient and willing to send an email every two weeks to get gaslit and false hope for when orders will be sent, then go for it. They make a lot of promises but either don't follow through or wait for you to give up. They seem to blame customers instead of changing their practice which feels very scammy. I personally will not be buying from them again.

Review.Titre: Absolutely the worst experience i have…
Review.Contenu: Absolutely the worst experience i have ever had, im 100% sure this is a SCAM!! Just want my money back..SO YOU ARE SAYING THIS IS NOT AN AUTHENTIC REVIEW BUT I EMAILED YOU MULTIPLE TIMES WITH ZERO REPLIES. YES I DID GET SCAMMED. ALL IN WANT IS MY MONEY BACK..

Review.Titre: 4 Months and No Saber.  Not answering my emails now.
Review.Contenu: I place an order with DXSabers on 2/21/23.  After 2 months, I get an email saying my order was disputed and they are not shipping the saber.  I didn't dispute the order and contacted my bank and there was not dispute.  They said it was there mistake and my order would ship within a week.  The next week came and no saber.  I contacted Brianne, customer support, and she sent me a USPS tracking number.  I checked the number and the saber wasn't picked up.  I kept checking it every few days and it was never picked up.  After a month, the number was deleted from the system.  I contacted Brianne once again and she was personally going to go to the post office and get to the bottom of the problem.  I was told I would have it by the end of May.  Tried the tracking number and it didn't exist on the USPS site.  Have been emailing DXSabers the last 2 weeks to get a refund or my saber and they are now not responding to me.  Not a great way to run your business.

Review.Titre: You’ll wait for eternity- and CONS STOP INVITING HIM
Review.Contenu: I was one of the many this “company” scammed. Met them at a con and seemed awesome until my bank kicked back and contacted me with a fraud alert months later! Paul will make you wait… and wait…. And wait and- oh look you’re out the money!Also it shouldn’t be up to the consumer to contact them constantly asking for updates on their purchase. He claims email is “more professional” but it’s either never answered or really rip into you rude. Don’t order from here ever! They’re fraud, scammers and a mess! TO CON EVENT HOSTS- STOP INVITING THIS DUDE! HES NOT GOING TO BRING YALL PEOPLE BACK BECAUSE THEY’LL START TO WONDER ID YOU HOST SCAMS INSTEAD OF FUN!

Review.Titre: Don't get involved with DX Sabers!
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for 2 sabers 6/19/2021 for 2 sabers that were listed as "in stock" and have been listed as such ever since. The order was for Halloween that year, but I still have not received anything to date, including a refund. As Halloween of 2021 neared, I got customer service involved in some slow email back-and-forth (several dozen - days between responses) and I was given various production excuses - but they were always supposed to be resolved and I'd receive my order soon. These sabers were supposed to be in-stock, don't forget. I eventually asked for a refund since I no longer  needed the sabers and was told I could only have store credit. They actually had the nerve to email me again 5/13/22 (6 months since my last communication with them, which was to request a refund and almost a year after placing the order) telling me my order will be ready now, if I could only send them more money to cover additional shipping costs they incurred. My original order was $500 USD with FREE shipping. I received nothing and no refund. Being from Canada, there is little recourse for me to continue pursuing the matter. I was defrauded.Don't get involved with DX Sabers!

Review.Titre: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY!!
Review.Contenu: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY!!! my boyfriend placed an order over a YEAR AGO and after being promised almost monthly that this order would ‘arrive soon’ they eventually cut contact. when i finally got into contact with them on instagram, they went on some rant about how their company had been scammed and they ‘couldn’t afford’ to refund us….. the owner then went on to try and guilt trip us by saying he couldn’t talk anymore because he was ‘babysitting his children’ and stopped responding to our messages. (so unprofessional!!!) we got an email a week later from his wife saying we would get a refund by the end of the month. it has now been over a month and a half later and we have been constantly ignored. I genuinely do not understand how these people have good reviews. I’m appalled at their customer service and the fact that they have scammed us out of nearly $300. really upsetting to see as i’m sure young/easy to scam people buy from here. DO NOT LET THEM DO THE SAME THING TO YOU. - dxsabers, if you are reading this, do the honest thing and give us our money back!!!
These people are criminals! They will send you a defective product on purpose to get you to send it back and then keep your money! It’s time for a class action lawsuit and  criminal charges!

Review.Titre: It’s been almost  2 years since I’ve…
Review.Contenu: It’s been almost  2 years since I’ve even heard from the company about my order. They just say “it will be there in a few weeks” I ordered it on January 23rd of 2021… it’s now august of 2022. I’ve been in contact over 20 times and it’s the same thing. Don’t buy it’s a scam. Still waiting on a refund or something but I am never getting that fs

Ordered a $350 saber for my son in November 2020. 18 months later and have received nothing. I have dozens of emails with them filled with lie after lie about how they had to move their production back to the US and my saber will ship next week. They have even sent me two fake UPS tracking numbers. I asked for a refund and they just replied that they are broke and can't afford to refund money. They are the epitome of the term scammers. I have never written a review in my life but I took the time to write this one because they scammed my son out of the money he earned himself. Do not give these horrible liars your money.

Review.Titre: I purchased my Saver in 2021 for a…
Review.Contenu: I purchased my Saver in 2021 for a birthday gift for my son. After 6 months of going back n forth they said they would send me accessories n what not, n after 12 months of going back n forth it was only promises. Never received my saver, and lost 350$ as it was too late to do a claim. Till this moment I haven’t received n we r in April 2022! DONT BUY, scam

Review.Titre: This company should not exist, period.
Review.Contenu: I met the owner of this company at a recent event in Mesa Arizona and he presented as pleasant and caring. This turned out to be a scam very quickly. My wife, other family members, and myself purchased sabers at this convention and while some of us walked away extremely happy about our purchases my wife and I were not as lucky.My wife purchased a Leia saber and I purchased a much more expensive Dark Saber, both had extremely bad issues and should never have been up for sale in all of our opinions. The Leia was missing multiple screws, had stripped threads on multiple areas, and the emmiter was literally falling out. My Dark Saber stops working randomly, switches profiles randomly, and has sound issues galore. Both sabers are poorly machined, have very sharp edges, and overall feel cheap.The owner was apparently removed from the event, or left early to avoid selling underwhelming products, as he was not present the very next day and another saber vendor handled making sure that we were taken care of and gave us this owner's contact information. The owner has not replied to any of our emails and we will absolutely never deal with this company again.We were made aware of this site by fellow saber community members and wish that we had this information earlier. Overall terrible experience and there are definitely better, actual caring saber vendors out there that will take care of their customers honestly and properly.

Total scam, got a broke saber, paid to send back then got ghosted.   There  are a lot of reputable dealers just not this one…My son purchased a saber from this scammer, the product was broke when arrived and when he sent it back for repair he was ghosted.  DO NOT order from this source

Personally I have ordered from these guys in the past and have had some very good experiences and decent service so I decided to order from them again their newsletter said all orders would be shipped and delivered by Christmas time mine wasn't I contacted support and was told it's be delivered by the 1st of January and I'd receive shipping details within a day or two of the 26th December many days later now still no updates I messaged them again on the 31st December and here now on January 7th I've received no response or update on a 600 plus dollar order which is very concerning. I'm hoping that I actually receive this as it has been over a month since I placed the order and I have been guaranteed a delivery date twice. Update I have filed a fraud case with credit card company and gotten money back. I would not order from this company I believe they have scammed me. Bad place and horrible service. they even had the nerve to ask me to leave a good reviews as "internet trolls" people who have been scammed leave bad reviews. Just a pathetic experience this time around!

Review.Titre: If I can give DX Sabers a "No Star…
Review.Contenu: If I can give DX Sabers a "No Star review I would. DX Sabers took me through HELL!! PayPal returned my money months later but trust the process was long and painful. You will be sorry if you do business with them. Try Seansolo Sabers on etsy. Much better experience. Don't walk run from DX Sabers!

They said : Im preparing proffie core for you.They said : its gonna be a neopixel (Cuz i bought neopixel mystery box)Its been 2 months since i ordered.I recieved today from Turkey and its not worth it. Not worth to wait, not worth to money. Not proffie, not neopixel, not recommend it..

Review.Titre: Ordered place for a saber on July 28
Review.Contenu: Ordered place for a saber on July 28. It is Oct 16 and have yet to recieve the saber or any updates on order.

Review.Titre: Waste of time and money. I never received what I paid for a year ago.
Review.Contenu: I preordered a lightsaber duo in Feb 2021 for June release. I had to email in July about tracking information. Was given an excuse about factory issues and given a new delivery date of first week of august. I emailed in September and was told they’d ship out at the end of October. I emailed in November and was told they’d ship out in a few weeks. I emailed in January and was told they’d be delivered the next week. Well it’s April now and I never heard anything from anyone or received my order. It should never be on the customer to chase a business for looking for information on merchandise I’ve already paid for. Any shipping delays should always be communicated by the company in a timely manner. Don’t waste your money or time with DX sabers.Update from April 4, 2022: I requested a refund of my money and they told me they could only give me store credit because my money was already invested in making my product. Or I could accept paying a restocking fee of $159 AND a processing fee of $129. That is over half of what my original cost was for items I have never received. They also told me my items were shipped out Friday and I needed to wait 24 hours for tracking info to show up. While I doubt this is true, they should have emailed me the tracking info themselves if it is.
DO NOT BUY FROM THESE PEOPLE THEY LIE AN STEAL FROM YOU IF YOU DONT BELIVE ME I HAVE EMAILS AS PROOF ALL THEY DO IS STALL AN LIE

Review.Titre: Two bad experiences with this company
Review.Contenu: Two bad experiences with this company. Initially around two years ago I purchased two base lit sabers, that were meant to come with a bunch of extra things (kyber crystal and a few other things). It took months and months of being told "they're shipping next week" before they finally arrived. One didn't have the promised smooth swing, and the praetorian didn't have any holes drilled for the screws to secure the core, and the core was in pieces with a broken speaker. I found communication with them extremely difficult and ended up just accepting it was a bad purchase and left it at that.In February this year I noticed they had been really trying hard and apologising on social media, so I thought I'd give it another try. I ordered two proffie mystery boxes, and then waited 9 months for my product to arrive. Again getting the usual "they'll be shipping next week!"When they arrived, one was a baselit, again not even with smooth swing, and the second one was a broken neopixel, that very clearly wasnt a proffie, since it lacked a memory card. No actual reply to my many emails asking them for an updated number and over 2 months later no cores. We have empty shells with no electronics to make it work. They keep promising with no delivery. 2 light sabers have no cores. I paid for it already with cash. Then they have the NERVE to send me email promising me it was mailed out and ASKING ME TO REMOVE my one star review. I will do no such thing because I still do not have the product which I was promised and PAID FOR OVER 2 MONTHS LATER! You want good reviews ? Do your job and do it well. Don’t make false promises and don’t you dare come in with a reply to very well deserved one star review and try to lie your face off. If I could give you a negative star I would at this moment. If you actually have it and shipping from the US it doesn’t take 2 months. I don’t care where your shipment comes from, you lied about that too. China. Not the US eh? Want it removed? Send my son his light saber cores for his 2 light sabers now and stop making false promises and flat out lying WITH A REAL apology and actual omission of why you keep lying. Until then believe nothing this company claims. They are great at ignoring people when they want. Original review on the bottom, I will NOT remove. Horrible company. Do not believe the “good reviews” they have been banned from numerous places / events due to their shady business practices. Take note of how they have their “excuses” in the replies for bad customer service. We met them at a Comic Con event on Sat Oct 14. They sold us 2 light sabers but did not have the electronics on hand. Swore and promised up and down how it would be mailed out on Tuesday and arrive the Friday. Promised my 14 year old child. Friday came and went. No tracking. No nothing. I entered my information into the owners phone because he didn’t have anything to provide me with a receipt. Either way, no replies. Days later a reply with some cock and bull story of how their shipment was delayed from China, etc etc. after numbers back and forth, mostly from myself checking in, still no parts. Sent me a “tracking number” 2 weeks later with no actual shipment attached. More BS. My poor son has an empty shell of a light saber. And yes, I have ALL THE EMAIL EXCHANGES BACK AND FORTH FOR PROOF. They are just shady salesmen who don’t deliver. Stay away, safe your money and buy elsewhere. They guys are a sham. Read the bad reviews and believe those.

Now I still have the same gifted saber that was wrong and loose, no communication and my account t was deleted. Single handed the worst and most shady client experiance I have ever had. Review.Titre: Go elsewhere or lose your money
Review.Contenu: Final Edit 1/1/2023 : Luckily my credit card took my dispute and ruled in my favor, so I got most of my money back. I only disputed PART of my charges because I felt it only correct to dispute what I felt what I got was worth. Only decent humans would do that. That being said, I still would stay as far away from this company as possible. Poor business practices, and many promises made with none of them being kept. The only reason to buy from them, is if you don't mind losing your money.EDIT : Updating this review. After purchasing one via their website, getting the light saber that didn't match the pictures, was told the missing pieces would be shipped "next week" for over a month, was told the promos and other items would be shipped "next week" multiple times that it became a broken record. Realize that this guy is scamming people. He will get a few people sabers at a con, bug them to come here and write a positive review, and then ignore those that order online, or if he does deliver, it's a product that is much lower quality, may not match the pictures, and as someone who HAS taken them apart....a fire hazard inside due to poor electrical construction. I regret purchasing from him, and trusting his word over the many reviews and claims online. Claims those people are just haters, or 'have issues at home', or any one of many reasons to make him seem like he's being wronged.....Do yourself (and your wallet) a favor and believe what others say. Original Review Below :Met them at Thygeekdom con. Purchased both a neopixel saber and a mystery box on the spot. They had to actually go back to their shop, nearby, and he upgraded the hilt I wanted with a neopixel setup. That being said, the neopixel saber is fantastic. The smoothness of it, everything about it is fantastic. I love the effects, and everything about it. I'm concerned about durability, but this saber is more a prop for costumes than it is one for play.The mystery box I bought was a RGB lit saber, and while I did have some minor issues out of the box, it was easily remedied with some email support.While the email support wasn't immediate responses, I didn't have to wait longer than 48 hours for any response during the normal work week.

I had originally purchased two lightsabers from DXSabers back in May 2022 on Mercari. I used them for a convention that I attended in July and discovered that one of the lightsabers ran out of power very quickly. After reaching out to the company on Instagram, I was told that the lightsabers have a "lifetime warranty" and that they would replace my lightsaber at no extra cost. At the time I was thinking to myself that this would be perfect, since I planned to attend New York Comic Con that following October and would need them in working condition for my cosplay.Fast forward to the rude email I received after reaching out to them about my exchange, and poor interactions I had with the company on Instagram. I sent my lightsaber back to them weeks before Comic Con, knowing that I needed to receive a new one back in time. Not only did they forget to package the entire lightsaber when sending it back to me, but the following package that they sent with the missing blade and attachment piece didn't arrive in time for the convention.The person who I was conversing with on Instagram frequently refused to respond to me, prompting my partner to have to reach out to them in order to get a reply. I find it entirely misogynistic and disrespectful for them to ignore me and that my partner had to go out of his way in order to maintain some kind of communication with them. I was never once rude to them in my conversations with them, and simply wanted a working lightsaber to use for my cosplay. Instead, I was promptly ignored and met with so much unprofessionalism that I didn't even have any motivation to attend Comic Con that day.I still have not received a reply from them after reaching out one more time and told them that I would write an honest review about my poor experience with their company. I will be taking my business elsewhere.

Was not worth itMet these guys at a con. They seemed really cool and had some really awesome looking hilts, including the pair of specific character hilts I wanted. So, I decided to buy them through their online store the next chance I got. It ended up taking 7 months for me to receive my sabers. Customer service was very polite…once I finally got a hold of them. I had to reach out to them for any updates on my order. They were rarely (if at all) the first ones to give me any updates. Any update I would get just seemed like excuse after excuse. Even up to the shipping of the order. They sent me a tracking number and my order still didn’t ship for another month. Kept getting the “It will be sent out this week” or “So sorry for the delay. You should be treated like family and we are doing our best”. Or something along those lines. Got promises of free accessories AND a free saber for my patience. None of which came with my order. When I reached out about the lack of extra things that were promised. I got the same excuses of they’ll go out this week each week I asked about it. Finally did get some free accessories but never got that extra saber they promised, and they never acknowledged it again either. Now, I wish I could say the sabers were at least worth the cost, but I really can’t. Took them to a con for the first time and one was a constant struggle to work. Pretty sure both died before my friend’s sabers too, but then they miraculously were acting normal again without being charged. So not sure what’s going on there. Both kept falling apart, one was just pieces and the other was completely in half. Just not worth it when walking around a con all day.

One need only do a search on Google, Reddit, and YouTube to see there are dozens upon dozens of people with similar experiences. Buyer Beware  Purchased a NeoPixel Dark Saber August 25th at Botcon from DX Sabers - Paid $424 via square.  Asked if they could ship it to me since I had other stuff to carry home.  They pleasantly agreed to do so.Aug 31st - No pressure, just asked what the usual time before it ships.  No response.Sept 6th.  - Contacted again.  Told I would get tracking 'Right away' Sept 7th - Asked what 'right away' meant.  Told I would get it 'later tonight'. Sept 8th - Contacted let them know I didn't get it.  No response.Sept 9th.  Contacted let them know I dididn't get it.  No response.  Stated I didn't want this to go down a negative route.  But at this point had already learned about their bad reputation.  Responded and said they were 'at another con' but would get it 'later tonight'.  Told them if they were unable I'd be fine with a refund.  Said they 'stand by their word' but it had just been a crazy couple weeks.Sept 10th.  Contacted as I hadn't heard back as they promised.  Another round of 'they were really tired but can guarantee he'd give me hourly updates(not sure why or how) given that he also stated his factory in china didn't open until the next day.Sept 11th.  Got a tracking number.Sept 15th.  Got a cheap hollow core round non-distinct saber.  Contacted them and they condescended and said 'you seem to forget we promised you a mystery saber with your purchase'.  I wasn't asking for the mystery saber to be sent.  I was asking for the Dark Saber I spent $424 on.  Told them I was disappointed because they never mentioned they were only sending out the cheap 'freebie' instead of what I actually ordered.  They defended saying they always answered me promptly when I had a concern.  Also said I'd receive tracking Monday on the Dark Saber.Sept 19th - Tuesday and no tracking.  Contacted.  No response.Sept 20th - Wednesday and no tracking.  Contacted.  No response.Sept 21st - Emailed and said their sons wer sick but that I'd have tracking in 24 hrs.Sept 23rd - No tracking after 48 hours.  Contacted.  No response.Sept 24th - Fed up I emailed and said I didn't know what to do here other than to pursue means to get my money back and warn others.  Told them if I didn't have tracking by Monday night I'd send the 'freebie' back to them on my dime and expect a refund.  They responded talking about the kids being sick again.  Hey I get it, I had 6 kids.  But I also am asking for nothing more than that they tell me when its going to ship and actually do so.  They give me a tracking number that doesn't show dropped off.Sept 26th - I email fed up because it doesn't show dropped off.  I stick to what I said on the 24th and I put the freebie in the mail and send them proof I dropped it off via USPS tracking.  I get a frenzied response pack and was told they were mistaken it actually sent through UPS and was given yet another tracking number.  I track it and that show that the destination is a completely other state and shows at .4 lbs.  When the Neopixel is over 2lbs just for the hilt alone.  Then I was told no, that's wrong it actually went USPS.  And to check.  It finally showed dropped off.Sept 28th - Finally get it in the mail.   It comes without a box for either the hilt or the blade.  Both were loose in a previously used and shipped plain brown box.  The hilt and blade were scared/marred.  No charging cable.  Tried using a charging cable I have and it wouldnt' charge.  Either it busted because it was shipped completely loose or they shipped me a saber already used and broken.I have all emails and text messages and pictures.  I waited over a year for my Moducase no problem.  Why?  Because they were forthright on what to expect.  Hell, we wait all the time for preorders as collectors.  But this was never about waiting.  This was about people who continually told me one thing and did another...or rather didn't.  At this point I just want others to know not to trust this company or anything they say or do

Review.Titre: Take it from a former customer-
Review.Contenu: I ordered a saber from Paul a couple years ago. It finally arrived 5 months later after many emails and DM’s. I was told shipping was free but had to pay $75 when I went to pick it up. At the time Paul was claiming they built all their sabers themselves even tho mine clearly had ‘89 Sabers’ written on it and the images he used on the DX site were lifted straight off the Alibaba site. He then told me that since they were ‘making’ a new model mine was a one of a kind, a laughable, outright lie. When I received my near 600$ saber the speaker was blown, the blade didn’t fit and the battery include was generic and dangerous. After approximately 3 months the saber quit working all together. In the past few weeks this site has been inundated with positive reviews, many of them double and even triple reviews from some people. This is typical as Paul offers discounts and free merchandise to people who leave positive reviews. If you read carefully you’ll notice some reviews mention only customer service (user hasn’t received defective product yet) or intent to buy (user hasn’t even purchased yet). Please do your research before purchasing from DX, there are many respectable saber builders to choose from.Edit after Paul’s reply:I purchased my saber 2 years ago, not 3. Paul’s first lie in his response to this review.I received no offers for DX to replace or any other offer in reference to my issues. Why wouldn’t I accept a refund if it had been offered? Paul’s second lie.I have not harassed any customers of DX. In fact I have screen caps of Paul asking me harass other individuals (or ‘put them on blast’ in his words) while I was feigning support for DX to try and expedite shipment of my saber. Paul’s third lie.  I have never mentioned Paul’s wife in any post. All business decisions are Paul’s and Paul’s alone and he is ultimately responsible for the actions of the company. Paul’s fourth lie.The only social media where I have talked about DX is on the Facebook page ‘DX Sabers Exposed’ where the multitude of dissatisfied customers gather to discuss the abhorrent business practices of DX Sabers amongst ourselves and seek professionals to help repair the substandard products we received. I have not said anything online about DX besides on the that page -with the exception of this honest review- certainly not on ‘every social media platform’ as I only have a Facebook and Instagram.  This Paul’s fifth lie.LGT is the one that severed ties with DX after blowback from customers. A statement from LGT can be found on their site. Paul’s sixth lie.Referring to a negative review as ‘spite’ and attacking reviewers is straight out of the DX disinformation playbook. This post is not spite, this is to assist others before their purchase. You’ll notice similar responses from him on all reviews from other dissatisfied customers. Paul’s seventh lie. Seven lies from DX in one online reply. Typical. As for DX not soliciting reviews with incentives, scroll down and you’ll see bulk positive reviews across single days, June 11th for example. Coincidence? Yeah, I didn’t think so either.UPDATE: Paul continues to make outrageous claims such as he has been threatened with death or rape (!) or kidnapping. Any rational person can see through these wild claims, the man is a delusional criminal who has caused serious damage to the saber community. I encourage anyone who is considering a purchase to visit DX SABERS EXPOSED on face book or visit the Saber Souce website entry on this company. Please, shop elsewhere!!

UPDATE: Paul, I did in fact order from your company. I have communicated with you multiple times over email, Facebook, and Instagram in the past 9 months. Please refrain from gaslighting your customers. As someone who preaches "be kind to others", maybe you should take your own advice. You are correct many companies have a 30-day return policy, and usually, those 30 days start when the item is received. Not ordered. It took over 5 months for you to ship me my hilt. You would not take the return when it arrived broken. How can you have a return policy that is up before you even send the product out?!As for your claim about shipping labels, yes you are correct that you pay for the label when it is created. However, you all you need to do is go into your UPS dashboard and click "void shipment" and UPS will refund your money. I know this because I also have a UPS account. You can create HUNDREDS of tracking numbers, then void them, and get your money back. Your claim that none of your customers have had to file claims with their bank is also false, because I had to do just that. Additionally, there are other firsthand accounts of having to do just that from many other who you have scammed. All people need to do is look up DX Sabers on Facebook or YouTube and they will find a great many useful reviews of your business practices.  In summary, I have indeed ordered from your company, and I have been scammed by you, just like countless others. I am stuck with a nonworking saber that you have refused to help fix or refund me for. I had to go through the arduous process of claiming fraud with my bank. Once I provided them with screenshots of our communications, my claim was processed, and I finally got my money back. You have blocked me on all your social media and my emails have now gone unanswered for a month, so I assume you blocked me there as well. If you truly want to become a better company, you will start being honest with your customers. You are STILL reselling LGT hilts, despite your claim to the contrary. (At least as of 4 months ago when I received my "Hatred of Ren" with a Proffie board clearly labeled "Darkwolf & LGT Saber Studios" on it, and a battery that is labeled "Saber Studio")PLEASE DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY!!ORIGINAL REVIEW:One star is too many! Paul and DX are known scammers in the industry. You need to look no further for proof than one of the most recent reviews where the review was written by Paul himself!! He makes fake accounts and gives himself glowing reviews to con unsuspecting and naive people into giving him money. If you order from DX, you will be lucky to receive your saber at all. Paul's predatory "refund" policy states that you can only request a refund within 30 days of ordering. Yet the shipping estimate on his website is at least 6 weeks. He will string you along by sending you fake tracking numbers, or even going so far as to print a real shipping label, but never actually drop the package off. By the time you realize that you have been conned, it is far beyond the 30 days that you ordered and now you have to file a fraud claim with your credit card company. Bottom line is DO NOT, EVER, UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES, ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY.

Everything was just strewn about the bottom was literally broken off in the speaker was hanging out. Terrible experience for a $300 mystery box. Currently in dispute with my bank because I can't send it back in the mail because it melted when I tried to turn it on because he crosswired it.EDIT AFTER PAULS REPLYPaul everything you said in that reply is a lie I have video evidence of the box coming out of the post office in the one single box at the saber comes in unless you're saying eye doctored government footage as well. I only got nervous and started asking questions when the package didn't show up when you said it would and then you got very defensive and stopped responding. You never asked for any video evidence of anything. As soon as I told you that I got the saber and it starts smoking when I turned it on. You immediately accuse me of breaking it and said I did it on purpose. I made an unboxing video and showed no foam or anything. You literally don't understand that when you do this Paul that some people actually have evidence against you. So when you make these allegations that everything's faults, you should probably make sure that these people don't have proof of doing what you are doing. I haven't even gotten the refund from my bank as it takes time to do the investigation so that's false as well. You're just refusing to refund because this is how you do business. You send out busted savers to people and then they return them to you to get fixed and then they never get them back. There's a reason why there's literally hundreds of these types of reviews on your site and all over the internet because you are a dishonest business personNobody and I repeat nobody talk to me about going to buy one of their savers. I did my research after you ripped me off and found a reputable company and guess what? I got my saber in the condition that it should have been in from you.The fact that you have to sit here and write short story reviews to these. Only kind of tells people that you are lying. I'm really truly disgusted by your behavior. Paul, especially when you try to use my veteran status to try to push your company. I know that was your plan because you were very adamant about me making a video and sharing it to you unboxing it. I know how you do business you drop ship so you don't order the saber until someone actually buys it and then you order it from another company. And the reason why my package didn't show up on time is because your dropship package from China didn't show up on time and so when I started the refund you just threw in some junk saber and threw it in a box so you could try to check that and cover yourself with my bank because you hadn't sent out my product because usually you like to wait for people to wait months until it's outside the chargeback. But I being a combat veteran and a purple heart holder have way way more sense than most and I don't let people off the chain with that kind of money. Paul says I broke the saber yet when I took it out of the box and I literally put the saber blade into it and turned it on. It starts smoking. I opened it up and looked at the core and the thing was just hotwired literally broken. The speaker was hanging out the bottom out of the box. No foam in it. Like I said everything Paul said in his reply to my comment was a lie. This is how this guy does business and it's pretty sad especially trying to use my disability as a veteran to try to say that's why I canceled my order which is total bsOh brandondale didn't tell me to do anything. He was just the guy that offered to try to make things right for me after you sent me something that literally caught fire trying to blame him for trying to do something right saying he orchestrated it. It's just a lie and honestly pretty pathetic of you. Paul. Take some responsibility for your actions.Also, Paul, I have all the copies of our email correspondence and you stopped responding to me when I told you that it came and damaged and it melted when I tried to turn it on and smoked and then you immediately accuse me of breaking it and cut off all communication with me. So don't try to say that I stopped replying to your emails when you offered to help because the help never was offered. And again I have all our email correspondence. I don't know why you think you can get away with all these faults things when people have evidence proving everything they say is 100% right DISGUSTING AVOID THIS COMPANY especially if you don't want a product that catches fire.

Review.Titre: Theft and Fraud are the only things…
Review.Contenu: Theft and Fraud are the only things you'll get from DXSabers. I was strung along for 9 months and have no Saber and no refund. This was to be a VERY special birthday gift for my son. Review.Titre: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY
Review.Contenu: Ordered a saber back in March, and it was continuously pushed back. After posting a negative review on Google (which now they removed all company info and reviews), they claimed it was sent and that I should get a tracking email for it. Never received it, and now they are ignoring all my emails when I ask for a refund. I have sent 6 in the past week and not a single one has gotten a response. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY.

As soon as I got a replacement for the piece of junk that I was sent then I will change my review but you have not done anything you have promised. Don't ever order from DX savers you will get a broken piece of junk do your homework and read the reviews all over the Internet especially on YouTube.

Review.Titre: This company is a total scam
Review.Contenu: This company is a total scam. I paid in full last November 2020. I’m still waiting. Now they are saying that it was delivered.. The gift was for a relative diagnosed with cancer. Don’t waste your money. The lies the waste of time the promises. They should be ashamed of themselves. I trusted them and thought they were an honest company.

Review.Titre: I wasn’t even give them a star as my…

Crappiest company everIn December I had ordered the dark rey sword. Until today nothing has been delivered. Every month I was promised until the end of the month the sword would be there. After I demanded my money back, the communication has ceased. They do not answer me on any channel, neither via mail, Facebook or Instagram.I can only advise anyone not to order anything there. I will probably never see my 600 euros again. Sh**t store

Review.Contenu: This guy is a scam artist. He was a vendor for LGT Saber Studios. Hi Everyone, best don't waste your time with Dxsabers, it is definitely scam, I have ordered about 3 month ago and I have not received anything, only promises they cant keep. I will be asking my bank to return my money and I am sure the positive reviews done by themselves. Before you order search, I have proof of order , don't order anything from these guys they are good scammers.

Ordered on 5/5/21- advised 4-6 weeks.Repeated inquiries, with prompt replies.However, all promises made have not been kept.Requested refund, and told to wait until I get the product, and then return it.This date, 8/9/21, have not received.Turned over to credit card company for resolution.Suggest shipping elsewhere.Jim Asbury

Review.Titre: They WILL take your money and WASTE your time!!!
Review.Contenu: I would give less than one star if i could, my order was placed on September 24th, 2021. Ive contacted the customer service multiple times asking about updates on shipping or anything. Ive been told that I would receive shipping info the next week, a week rolls by and nothing, they have refused to give me a refund stating that the money I’ve given them is used to manufacture the lightsaber and that because they are made to order the money has been used for that purpose. Yet here i am 6 months later, I don’t have my money or the lightsaber they say it was used to build. WTH?!

Review.Titre: Trust the bad reviews.  Total scam!!!
Review.Contenu: Just like everyone else says, do not buy from them period.  Been waiting on our Saber since 4 February.  I reached out to Nicole and she explained how backordered they are.  I then asked for a refund and she said she had to ask her boss.  I have sent numerous emails after that with no response.  How pathetic of a company to ghost people and steal their money.  Please, do not trust them.  We had to cancel with our bank.

Review.Titre: 4 months later, still no response or the item I ordered!
Review.Contenu: I ordered an item in late December 2020. 4 months later, I still don't have the item I ordered. I have been ghosted by them, blocked on social media, and they won't return any of my emails. I have made my point with real details. Good luck DXSaberZ. Hope you decide to keep this account on Trust Pilot and not delete it. #exposedIf it walks like a duck, and sounds like a duck, it's probably a duck.

Review.Titre: I wrote a review of my experience a few…

If everyone on the internet is saying it’s a scam it probably is. Just order from a reputable company like crimson dawn or Vader’s vault!! I’ll let you all know if I ever get my saber from DX but I doubt it will ever come.

I ordered a Neopixel from them on March 12th 2021. I was guaranteed delivery in 2-6 weeks and I have not even received any updates. these guys are clearly scammers and at the very least just buy sabers and sell them back to customers. Over Dms on Insta DX said Id get it in month but screw that im cancelling through my bank and ordering from Artsabers instead.

Review.Titre: Check out DX Sabers Exposed on FB for…

Review.Titre: As other people are saying,DX Sabers is…

Review.Titre: So far this has not been a good…
Review.Contenu: So far this has not been a good experience. Ordered through this company in November of last year. I've sent numerous emails from my yahoo account as well as my Gmail. I even sent up an instragram acct so I could try to talk to them that way.I just want the product if they can't fulfill it ill gladly take a refund and go from there.I understand the challenges that companies have faced during covid.But I feel I have been more than patient with them.

I got scammed $300 for Ahsoka Lightsabers that will never ship. It’s been five months and everything this company has said is a lie. I’ve been waiting for a tracking email, and still haven’t gotten one. Not only that but when you email their customer service, it’s an automated reply 99% of the time. DO NOT BUY FROM THEM! For the past 6 months ive been trying to reach out to them in order to have the item and then they blocked me.... they literally suck and I will take them to court over this.

Review.Titre: Awful customer service and a bad product
Review.Contenu: Got my son one of these for Christmas after 1 month it has stopped charging. He's not even used it as we have been in lockdown. Contacted them on fb no response. Contacted them on email nothing. If you think you are getting a quality item for the money you're not. If you think they will care about you they don't even though the website says they do. Just avoid and go to a reputable company it will stop your kids being dissapointed.

Review.Titre: i wish i could give this negative stars…
Review.Contenu: i wish i could give this negative stars i ordered 6 months ago and no word on my order. i emailed the company 6 times throughout this period and no response at all, i go on the guys instagram page and he’s got tons of inventory so why aren’t these people getting their sabers? i put in a claim with my bank to get a refund cuz my emails weren’t being answered. i repeat don’t order from this company they will give you the excuses that their suppliers were scam or they just switched servers.

Review.Titre: It really was a scam. if its not, then they screwed me over.
Review.Contenu: I paid over 600 for an order. I messaged them a week before it was supposed to have arrived since I still have not gotten any shipping info. Untrustworthy seller. Lies about stock (extended wait times and continuously lies) and where the items are manufactured. They are Asian products, but he claims USA made. Overpriced for the merchandise. You can purchase from over a hundred other RESELLERS for a fraction of what they up charge.

DxSaber seems very cool,I thought in the first place as well, but its a big scam. Where to begin? After dropping upwards of $400 on a saber via Etsy, I found Paul's store closed weeks later - with no way to contact through official channels to request a refund. Responsive customer service, wide selection of sabers, and that's about it.Sent me a poorly constructed saber - constantly loose screws, poorly aligned, and a somewhat splotchy paint job.  Was informed that wasn't enough of a reason for refund but I was welcome to choose another product of equal or lesser value, or be sent a replacement.
