Two hundred bucks down the drain.  I'd recommend going with a different company before DX.
Make ur delivery faster. I ordered mine two weeks ago and estimated time said only 5 business days

I placed my orders In early 2020. One I’m February one in March. I received the one from March over a year later in may and the one from February I still have yet to receive. The saber I did receive the battery shorted out only 2 weeks after receiving. I ended up replacing my inside chassis with a golden harvest v3 from dark wolf sabers. Do not waste your money or time.

Terrible.   Ordered on 11/20 and it took almost 2 months to receive.  After being told it would arrive by Christmas.  Contacted to update my address because we had moved since ordering.  Saber was still delivered to old address.  Was delivered in original packaging, taped to death.  Perfect way to get a package stolen.  Arrives, unwrapped with zero instruction.   Says it's baselit when I ordered a neopixel.    The way their digital receipts are organized, you can't don't get a complete description.  Shady business.

Review.Titre: A purchase to never make again
Review.Contenu: I had to wait 5-6 months for my saber to even ship. But somehow it did, it’s great that it even turns on and can have sound with colors. But the light on the hilt that powers it doesn’t even work so I cannot know how many seconds it has been so I can change the color or sound (his YouTube shows how you can change stuff by flashing indicator on the button) or kind of clash. If they reached out and ask if they want to fix it, I would say no because I don’t want to wait a year for it to come back

Review.Titre: Ordered from here a while ago
Review.Contenu: Ordered from here a while ago, the Anakin neopixel saber. Waited a while and never received it, didn't even get a notice to say it had shipped. Seems like this is a very common occurrence, though I was lucky enough to get a refund for it, I guess because it was ordered before this business came under fire for bad practices. Overall it really seems like a business to avoid, make sure you do research before purchasing sabers, there are many sites like this that seem too good to be true with their prices, and it's because they are. You get what you pay for, as they say.

Review.Titre: Not a scam but I don't recommend
Review.Contenu: I was so excited to receive my Darth Maul V2 Neopixel lightsaber only for it to come damaged. Now it wasn't the company's fault it was Fedex and their terrible drivers. However what WAS the company's fault was their terrible customer service rep Vera. Not only did she not help me with my actual problems, but she tried to sell me parts that I didn't need to fix the saber. She wasn't even listening to the actual problems. I got ahold of a different service rep in late December and she was helpful to an extent. Other than telling me I could make a return she didn't tell me how or give me any useful info on how to make sure they knew it was my saber arriving. So in February after being ignored for a month and a half I payed 35$ to ship my lightsaber back to Dx Sabers with my order slip to verify its mine. It has been in their possession for 2 weeks now and all of my social media, and 3 emails have been blocked as I asked for my refund for the broken 380$ lightsaber I returned to them. I got fed up and opened up a fraud case with my bank and they are now arguing to win my money back for me. Overall I will say while Dx Sabers is not a scam, it's a terrible game of hit or miss when you order from them.

I purchased a neopixel saber back in January. I believed for awhile that the owner of the company (Paul) was a very kind and professional business owner which I respected as an entrepreneur myself. Well... I was mistaken. After asking a few times for order updates I just kept getting dragged on and spoon fed lies which is rather unfortunate. After doing my research via reddit, google, etc, I came to find out that their supplier cut them off a couple months ago. I personally think the worst part is that he's taken down his google review page and tries to fabricate his reviews which is just a scummy business practice in my opinion. Not to mention, it's virtually impossible to get a refund because this guy will go ghost and the banks won't allow for it, especially if you've been waiting as long as I have. The only reason this isn't a 1 star review is because I do believe Paul is a nice guy with good intentions for the star wars community, but there's obviously been issues with suppliers, customer support, falsified reputation, and company staff. DX Sabers has got a lot to figure out, and I highly recommend pursuing a more reliable company for the time being whether you're a collector or just someone who wants a dang lightsaber.

I have been waiting on a saber for over 6 months now. It kind of hurts me to write this but i’ve been giving them the benefit of the doubt for quite some time. I’ve had to deal with two separate people “Master carsenic” and Brianne. I spoke with paul once and never again. I should point out that i’m military and currently live in japan. it is already hard to contact them without being ignored for days. My package was sent back for whatever reason according to my tracking number. Never actually got a reason for that. Took months to even try to get an answer. I personally believe it was shipped back to paul himself and on the map it shows a townhome neighborhood. I asked for either a refund or a new saber. Me and the other two people tried to work out a deal to get a new saber as a refund just seemed like a little to much work at the time. I had also asked if i could upgrade to a neo pixel saber since my package had already taken months to get figured out. They evaded that question everytime i brought it up in an email. they could’ve just said no and i would’ve been fine. They just decided to give me a refund now after several months.... AGAIN. the whole experience has been just overall bad. don’t buy from them as you will be treated poorly.

Ordered a mystery box and praetorian back in February, and received extremely limited customer service, often with my emails going unanswered.Two months later I received my mystery box saber but still no communication or sign of the praetorian. It didn't have the smooth swing as promised on the website, but it worked ok and looked fine.I sent 3 emails asking if my order had even been sent because I hadn't received an update since the inital confirmation of purchase, heard nothing for 3 months, and then the first time I actually get a response its too late to receive, since they hadn't sent tracking details.When I finally managed to organize a reshipping of the saber from a holding facility in another country, the product I received was completely unusable. The hilt was missing screw holes to secure the core, the core was missing half of the chassis, the electronics were all over the place, it had no smooth swing, and the speaker was blown.After I contacted the customer service and providing a video, I was informed that I would have to return the product at my own cost, and send back the entire thing (accommodating the blade drastically increased the cost of the return).I hoped that this was just a small company struggling to get their feet on the ground, and wanted to help out a little. Everything that happened from the moment of my purchase was an exercise in what not to do, and I'm extremely disappointed with the service and product from DX Sabers.I recommend looking elsewhere for your sabers.
It's on its way hoping not too long custom design too hopefully pushes my competitions to a new level

Review.Titre: My order still says installation and…
Review.Contenu: My order still says installation and testing underway so I can’t truly say the experience is perfect, but that may change once the saber gets here.

You guys are good but your take too much to answer a email or a DM , it's been 7 days since the last update of my order.Update Nov 13th - I got nothing .It never got to me and they promised almost every week to send a new one .. and that never happened.

I've ordered a total of 5 sabers from this company and everything has been decent quality and very timely delivery besides minor backups. They were pretty friendly with me when I tried to communicate with them though they weren't always timely responses. And then when I did have an issue with one of my sabers not charging correctly they managed to walk me through how to fix it.

Review.Titre: The saber is cool the lights are also…
Review.Contenu: The saber is cool the lights are also good the sound is ok (could be better). Unfortunately I live in europe and it took over a year for everything to arrive but the customer servise was nice

Kinda getting annoyed now. My saber was suppose to ship by 2/26 its now nearly a month later. Was told they had issues with a supplier and that it would ship on the 10th then 2 days before that they posted that they would be going out on the 15th......messaged them and their new customer service rep over 24hrs ago with no response from either one. They are obviously overwhelmed with customer service.

I had a pretty good experience with DXSabers. I reached out looking for a specific model without breaking the bank and they responded quick and assisted me. I pulled the trigger and purchased. I stumbled upon some tough reviews which made me nervous if I would even get the saber. The communication was pretty good. All in all, it took about 3-4 weeks to receive it. The USPS tracking was a little suspicious at first but after nudging DX via social media it got a move on. Receiving the package was a bit rough. The screws and wrench were out of the bag and it was pretty messy in the packaging. The charging cable was NOT included when it should have been. Putting the blade together with the saber was fine and the quality of the hilt is very nice. The instructions are definitely a little confusing and I have not figured out how to lower the volume (it says you can). I had to purchase my own charger which was upsetting because I did spend money for something that was supposed to be included in the costs. Overall, the hilt and blade are exceptional. The timeline was ok, just need to be able to provide accurate info and timelines to customers.  The customer service was good until the bit about my charger. The packaging needs improvement along with instructions for the saber. Additionally, DX uploaded a great video on social media explaining the company, what was going on, why everything was happening, etc etc. and as a consumer I could appreciate that. It helped make me understand what was going on on their side of things. I will likely purchase again.

Do I think DX is a total scam? Not necessarily. I received my saber but months after it’s order. I originally ordered the Luke Skywalker (episode VI and mandalorian) hilt on June 18th under the guise that the saber I was purchasing was chromed based on the photos available on the site at the time. Unfortunately, DX did not inform me that the hilt I was expecting was no longer the hilt being produced nor available to be shipped. I had to wait throughout June, July, and august as the new hilts were being assembled. I cannot recall exactly when the website was updated the new hilt began to be advertised, but I can provide a purchase receipt with the original chrome hilt to authenticate my purchase. I maintained communication with DX throughout my edit, of which I appreciated and they were very good at responding. I could’ve voiced my concern earlier but wanted to wait until I revive the saber as I wondered if i was alone in my confusion and alight disappointment that I did not receive the chromed hilt that I was led to believe was available on June 18th. The new hilt I received is very sturdy and doesn’t have moving electronics. It’s assembled well. The blade was 32” however and I wasn’t expecting that, I expected a standard 36” blade. I don’t think DX is totally scam, however, I do think they need to be less active on IG and more active in how they communicate as some other customers might be unintentionally led astray or receive incorrect information. Did I intentionally not receive a chrome hilt? I think so because I don’t think any were available and at the time, that wasn’t communicated on their site nor to me personally until the new hilts began production.

Review.Titre: Sent a lightsaber for an upgrade after…
Review.Contenu: Sent a lightsaber for an upgrade and after two years they only sent it back after I said I would take legal action if they didn't, which they labeled as "threats".Only sent the hilt back which they had stripped out and they then made me pay to ship the remaining parts back.  Dx sent me a neopixel blade and a stand to make up for it,  but a part sent back was the wrong part and some are missing, but they are trying to resolve this.

We ordered from DX Sabers and received package. There were some parts missing, so we contacted them. The sabers were for our son's birthday. It took several e-mails (all pleasant - no issues there) and we did get all the parts necessary and DX sabers also sent a complimentary hilt for our trouble. Everything arrived before the birthday, everything works and our son is very happy. These are really great sabers.

Review.Titre: Ups and Downs, but it was worth it!
Review.Contenu: It’s a long story. However it ends completely on a good note. I ordered a saber a little over a year ago, and was told that it would arrive in 6-8 weeks (this was also during Covid times so I expected some delay) after about 3 months I decided to reach out to get a status on my order. It took a little over 2 months to get a response ( I learned later there was an issue with their current customer support person). Eventually the owner began helping me through the whole process and explained what was going on. It still took around 6 months for me to receive my saber but I had semi-decent communication that whole time. But when the saber arrived oh man was it sweet. I would definitely recommend I’d you are not on a strict time constraint!!

Review.Titre: I liked the discount for the free…
Review.Contenu: I liked the discount for the free neopixel on May the 4th. Your May the 4th deals are why i still come back and buy with you guys every year no one else compares.

Review.Titre: Dx sabers we’re so great to me and my…
Review.Contenu: Dx sabers we’re so great to me and my wife and they were so helpful and nice they took care of showing us everything and my light saber had been amazing since I bought it so I just want to say thank you so much Paul

I picked up a saber (Chaos Control) at a comic con and was very happy with it. I ended up buying the Darth Maul set and got a few mystery box sabers as well. While I am not a fan of the mystery sabers I received, my son likes them, so I guess it's a win there. I do really like the Darth Maul Set. The lights are bright, the sound is loud, and I can duel with no problem. There were some delays with my order, but customer service got on it and got me taken care of.

Review.Titre: The seller was super friendly and great…
Review.Contenu: The seller was super friendly and great at communicating. My Saber came to me as described and I couldn't be happier.

I met Paul at C2E2 last year in December and bought the Invincible Jinn hilt. It was empty and said if I bought it then he’ll install the electronics so I did. He also said it would take only 2-3 weeks for it to come to my door based on where we were from. After those weeks I was being very worried I know all the drama vids dissing the company as a scam before I met him and wanted to give him a chance. I texted him for updates it took a while sometimes but delivered updating me with what’s the problem. It did take a few months to get the saber and I love it. Think he upgraded me with I neopixel cause I could’ve sworn I ordered it base lit but I’m not complaining my first neopixel and I’m loving it. I’ve had the saber for a few months and it hasn’t malfunctioned. Overall great hilt love the electronics and can’t wait to met them in a couple weeks. And he did tell me that all the hilts at cons would be installed so we won’t have that problem with delays anymore so that’s great. Hopefully pick up Kenobi’s or Starkiller’s hilt next purchase.
The end product is worth the wait. The price point is one of the least expensive.

I've purchased several sabers from DXsabers and overall it's been a pretty great experience. The quality of the sabers have been top notch; they've got a good weight to them, can withstand a drop on the ground, are great to engage in combat without feeling like you're about to bust the blade at contact and they look great both of our lit up. It took a little time trying to figure out how to use them, but there are instructions both on the website and printed that arrived with my sabers to help figure out how to use them.For the sabers I purchased online, they did take longer than expected, but the seller was attentive and tried to give the best ETA possible to keep me in the loop. They were also very open and willing to address any concerns and ready to fix any issues we encountered. I would probably recommend if buying online, to allow for extra time allowance in delivery and, if concerned, to immediately contact the seller to keep lines of communication open for regular updates, if needed.The sabers I purchased at a recent convention were exquisite, honestly love how they look and work, and could not stop waving them around and showing them off. If I'm ever at another convention where they are, I'll most probably be purchasing at least one or two more because they really are excellent

I ordered a saber in late February I believe. I understand that my saber will take a bit of time to deliver, as they are a small business and that’s normal. Even though it has taken about 4 weeks for my saber to ship, they have kept me updated in the process and answered every question I have. It should be coming in this week, and I know it will be well worth the wait!

Honestly, apart from the long wait (2 months) I got my saber. And it’s absolutely great! I already owned one of the cheaper Aliexpress sabers but the DX Sabers have so many more features that are worth the money! Don’t listen to the small minority saying they’re a scam. Yes the wait time is long, but it’s also a small business doing all the leg work. Screw the haters.

Review.Titre: Just got my Saber and it’s ABSOLUTELY…
Review.Contenu: Just got my Saber and it’s ABSOLUTELY AMAZING. Definitely worth going for the neopixle version. I had to wait a little longer than first anticipated but it’s well worth the wait and what you get for the price you won’t be disappointed. Paul kept in touch every step of the way. Looking forward to our next purchase from Dxsabers soon.

Review.Titre: Just received my helmet from Dx sabers…
Review.Contenu: Just received my helmet from Dx sabers and it’s so comfortable definitely worth the wait. It got shipped to the Uk within 2 days of receiving the shipping number. Paul is a great guy and very helpful trying to run his family business. We are just waiting for our saber we ordered I’m sure it will be amazing. Will definitely us Dx sabers again.

There is a lot of bad stuff going around and people say that it’s a scam but it’s not, people are just saying this because it’s what everyone else is saying, everyone who is writing reviews on here has not bought a lightsaber from them while I on the other hand have and can say that their products are great, shipping takes a while but very good customer service and brilliant lightsaber!

I placed my order in July and received my mystery box base lit saber yesterday(October).  My son loves his saber so much I decided to order a neopixel mystery box for myself.  I do recommend DX Sabers even if shipping does take a bit longer than expected.  You won't be disappointed with the product you receive!

At first, i was a bit worried because of the negative comments but IT'S AN AMAZING LIGHTSABER. It took a while to arrive but the lightsaber is so cool: 5 musics, 9 fonts for the different characters lightsaber and 11 colors. It's very bright and i am very happy about it.

I do a lot of prop and cosplay design work. DXSabers have been on the mouths of many Star Wars cosplayers. Their replica sabers have great attention to detail. My only 2 complaints are  they can be slow to respond to emails and their website could use some love and cleaner navigation.

Ordered my saber in May, got to me end of June it is a very cool saber little quirky till you get the hang of it. Only issues: 1) communication broke down and it got alittle hard to reach the shop, got quickly resolved once communication resumed.2) I had a tracking number for nine days saying the postal service didn't have it. Once it was put into the postal service got to me in 4 days would have been 3 (it was shipped priority mail) but there was a hang up on uspss' part.Really other than that dx was pleasant to do buisiness with.

Review.Titre: Dxsabers, great products but unreachable helpdesk
Review.Contenu: I'm very very happy with my product and I would definitely order on Dxsabers again however, I do feel a little mislead because the shipping was supposed to be free but when it arrived I had to pay €42 and I haven't been able to contact the company about it since...

Bought the mystery box a in May and it took a month to get to me. I was skeptical at first like everyone else was but the quick replies from DxSabers on Instagram were reassuring. Honestly if you want a budget lightsaber and have the patience then dxsabers is the way to go.

At first I thought this was a scam- but after looking though videos and more reviews with this company I knew I was taking a risk because of the 50/50 of bad and good reviews.After I bought it in Dec. I knew it would take 2-4 weeks for it to be ready then to be shipped. I waited but it was just kept getting longer, after talking to customer service and the owner- they got my order out, I got it and it was worth it for only $100-It was a basic but it was decent for my first lightsaber, thank youIf you want something different for higher price or something different then go for it and go to a different shop, don’t ruin a business because it’s small- Aliexpress has scams everyone but no one complains about that but this shop they do--Lou0420
Company is very compliant and do a well job explaining any problems. Waiting for my second saber right now and am very excited. The quality and price of the sabers can’t be matched anywhere else.

Review.Titre: Personally I had an overall great…
Review.Contenu: Personally I had an overall great experience with DX. The only problem I had was the shipping time but that was all communicated with. I would highly recommend DX to others :)
My son got a saber for a present and he is loving it.  it is amazing. the sound, the colors, lights and effects.....very well made and done.  These sabers are great.
lightsaber was in great condition arrived with a few missing screws but not a big deal delivery was delayed but that is expected with today’s situation

I have not ordered from them yet, but from all that I’ve seen so far, I’d say that their sabers look to be made in great condition and their sabers are pretty cheap for Neopixel lightsabers. While other companies sell them for around $700, DX Sabers offer Neopixel sabers as low as $300 and that’s a massive plus to me. Majority of the negative reviews I’ve seen have been about delivery time and damaged product and what I will say to those is that not everything you order online will come 100% perfect every order. There’s always gonna be complications and delays, not every time, but on small occasion. Especially with traveling and shipping, things can get damaged, so you can’t completely blame a company for damages when you account for shipping distance and when it’s in route to your home. Like I’ve stated though I’ve never ordered from them before, but I think the main thing is to just be positive and go into it with a positive mind.
The saber took a while, but it is incredible! The customer service is reliable and friendly! Would consider going through them again!

Right after Christmas I ordered a mystery box from DX Sabers as I saw the controversy and I thought I'd give them a honest shot.I ordered it and after 6 weeks it didn't arrive so I contacted them, they replied basically immediately and informed me about delays that they were having due to a few reasons and my saber would be a week late.I am from the UK so I had to wait a extra week on top of this for the saber to arrive.Once the saber arrived I was very shocked to find a really nice saber hilt, I turned it on and it was genuinely really cool, it was bright, had basically very colour, multiple sound fonts, 3 light modes and even played music.I am very happy with what arrived and people saying it is a scam are lying, I feel that the money I spent was well worth it and the only reason it doesn't have a 5 is because of the delivery time. I ordered on the 29th December 2020 and it arrived on 8th March 2021.Cheers for the Saber, keep up the work.To prove I am real, my insta is @audegrien
Great lightsabers, only problem was timing, took a little while but the company is great, would recommend.

Review.Titre: Had nothing but pleasure working with…
Review.Contenu: Had nothing but pleasure working with my order, always helpful when I've needed help.
Lightsabers look clean and their in a affordable price 👌🏽👌🏽
Amazing quality of the saber, waited longer than expected but it was totally worth it!!

Review.Titre: Great customer service and received my…
Review.Contenu: Great customer service and received my saber in perfect condition and on time

Review.Titre: Great customer service and the saber is…
Review.Contenu: Great customer service and the saber is absolutely brilliant

I saw there sabers at the Pittsburg comic con I thought they looked really cool so I ordered on for my husband for Christmas. I’m giving them five stars because I know the product is quality and they have good deals going on their website.  The only issue was shipping times being longer than expected but they responded to my emails and gave good customer service. The saber is on the way I’ll give an update when it arrives.

I love this Saber! It's really well built and reasonable. Their customer service has been A+ the have responded to every question. I have a second coming as a gift for a friend I can't wait for them to open it.

Everything about this purchase was great from the ease of purchase to the wonderful interactions with the team to the package that arrived at our home. The hardest part is deciding which savers we are going to buy next.
These guys are amazing, walked me step by step on how to charge my saber when I couldn’t figure it out, great response time and super friendly! Also they make great sabers!

Review.Titre: I got greeted by a very kind man who I…
Review.Contenu: I got greeted by a very kind man who I met at ANIME NYC and he had an awesome conversation with me and told me about his product. I was hooked on immediately and when business was concluded I was left very satisfied. I would highly recommend checking this place out for some high quality sabers and other blades if that’s your kind of thing :)

Review.Titre: Great light saber and good customer service
Review.Contenu: I was pleasantly surprise how great the light saver worked. I have bought more expensive lightsabers in the past and they didn't have as many features as this one. After a year of using it as a nightlight/display peace It stopped working. Luckily the saber comes with a lifetime warranty. I was able to contact the owner via text and mail him the broken saber. He replaced it in a few weeks. The owner kept in touch with me the whole time, gave me updates and a tracking number after he shipped the saber.

Review.Titre: I am jealous to everybody who bought…
Review.Contenu: I am jealous to everybody who bought one getting the order one soon once I get the money it's a lot better than the Obi-Wan Kenobi Black series lot lighter to carry and you can dual and smack people
I absolutely love my sabers. I've purchased multiple times from DXSABERS and will continue to do so.

Despite a bit of a wait, DX sabers got my lightsaber to me and I absolutely love it. I got the Sith Rey one and it’s so cool and is excellent quality. They are the sweetest people and their customer service is incredible. It’s a small business you should absolutely support!
Started with a little misunderstanding but recieved it everything on tim impressive to say the least

Review.Titre: Sabers shipped and arrived on time!
Review.Contenu: Sabers shipped and arrived on time!  They were definitely a hit when I gave them as a gift and even my in-laws enjoyed playing with the sabers!  I did contact customer service and they were quick to respond to my questions throughout the process.
Bought a neopixel dark saber a bit back, customer service is responsive and always does their best to assist in any issue you might have. Quality, fun blade and hilt as well.

Not sure why people say they've had a bad experience. With this company. I've had nothing but a great experience with this company. I ordered my neo pixel lightsaber last year and received it within a reasonable amount of Time. I am very happy with my product. And I've never had any issues with customer service. Just recently for some unforeseen reason, My light saber core got damaged, When I contacted customer service they were very friendly and quick to respond. I sent back my Lightsaber and and got it back with two weeks I'd even say the lightsaber worked ten times better than before. I'm very happy with the company, the customer service, and of the owners who personally helped me.5 stars always.

Review.Titre: My experience with DX started a few…
Review.Contenu: My experience with DX started a few months back, I ordered a Mandalorian lightsaber (Not a dark saber) but unfortunately the emitter wasn't in stock. They reached out and explained that to me, and I was sent another saber of equal value. I had a neopixel saber and a RGB blade due to a mixup at the warehouse. Paul and Brianne were quick to pick this issue up and rectify it, they sent me a neopixel blade with a decent amount of time, they've remained in contact throughout providing valuable updates on the situation. On my next order they will send out the original emitter that I ordered and a RGB saber as an apology, how could you fault customer service like that? I think people forget that these guys are human like the rest of us, they have lives, they're busy, they go to conventions, they might not be able to sort it on day one but they do sort it! Thank you again Paul, hope you and your wife had a lovely anniversary!

Review.Titre: By far the best saber we've ever owned
Review.Contenu: By far the best saber we've ever owned! You can tell they really care about making sure the quality of the product and the whole experience are the best they can be. Bought at a con and have been using it for display, dueling, and even home security!

Review.Titre: I had a fantastic customer service…
Review.Contenu: I had a fantastic customer service experience with DX Sabers. Despite a few hiccups with delivery and order details, the team went above and beyond to ensure that I received the neopixel saber I had paid for. Their dedication to resolving any issues was truly commendable. Overall, it was a great experience, and I'll definitely be recommending them to others. Patience is key when ordering sabers, and I can personally vouch that DX Sabers delivers on their promises.

We absolutely love our sabers, they are so realistic. It seems like every day we find something new on our light sabers!! The weight of them is just amazing, feels so real! Each part is super detailed and you can actually play with them… and not be worried they will break! Every time we have shown our sabers to friends & family they are so impressed. The owners are so friendly helped answer any questions we had, and really believe in their products!

The guys at DX are great! Excellent customer service and product. I bought a dark apprentice saber 2 years ago and the charging cord died today when I inquired about purchasing a new one they just handed me one! No questions asked.

Review.Titre: My brother in law got a saber that…
Review.Contenu: My brother in law got a saber that didn’t come with the proper charger (at a convention). We went back the next day and he gave us the proper stuff. He was very nice and knowledgeable

Wonderful customer service and sabers! DX Sabers answered my questions promptly and helped me find the perfect saber for my collection. Look forward to my next purchase and with the holidays coming up the youngling sabers will make perfect gifts for my nieces.

Awesome customer service! Super helpful, friendly and knowledgeable. Ive wanted a lightsaber for years and their prices are very reasonable. He also let me play with the lightsabers at the con (which was sweet) but what convinced me was the lifetime guarantee! The quality of the lightsabers are very solid and im a fan of differents led colors. (I have had trouble choosing which color to commit to with other lightsaber companies and now i have variety lol) im glad i got to catch the booth at the anime expo and had such a positive expierence 10/10 would recommend. :)

I really love the sabers from this amazing company, DX Sabers! The quality is incredible, so many wicked awesome options! I love all the colors and different effects the blade can do. And I love how light-weight the whole unit is. It’s not heavy at all, which is super nice and convenient, especially carrying it around at cons and other events. And the product seems extremely durable as well. I highly recommend getting a saber, or two from DX Sabers. You won’t regret it.

Review.Titre: Everything from the saber to the box is…
Review.Contenu: Everything from the saber to the box is absolutely top notch, customer service was absolutely incredible all the way through, always responds and is incredibly nice, I wouldn’t buy a saber anywhere else.

The Owner and another Worker on Saturday of Baltimore Comic-Con were super helpful. They introduced me into the sabers, and told me the process of how they are made. AMAZING Quality and one of the Best sabers ive ever scene. They were able to help me use the device and any questions i had, They answered and with a smile.

purchased at awesomeconcool booth setup, with demo units you could hold and feel, saw the guy working the booth smashing one on the concrete floor with no ill effects, i bough mine (dual saber with attachment piece)  to practice spinning staffs'
Bought a saber direct from these guys. Battery died within a year and he happily replaced no questions asked. Very happy with the customer service offered

The folks at DX sabers have been great with their communication and are most helpful.  I sent in a saber for repair from another company (who didn’t bother to return my emails), but DX were most helpful and responsive.  They are still working on the repair, but based on how they’ve worked with me so far, I know my saber is in good hands!

My orders are a bit late but DX have been keeping my posted. It has been an interesting year and the customer service of responding is alone 5 stars. Thank you all for keeping me posted and can’t wait to see them.

Great saber, great customer service. If you’re looking to start your collection and want something affordable this is the right place to be, I had no problem at all getting my sabers they got delivered fast faster then I expected I love them, they are good for dueling, collecting or whatever you wanna do, thank you to the ex saber team I appreciate all y’all. Ps. All y’all have a wonderful day or night were ever you’re reading this from.

Great saber for the cost. The milled aluminium hilt looks and feels nice. It begs for some customization and, given the price, I'm comfortable throwing on some spray paint and O Rings. If you are looking for a low cost neopixel lightsaber and don't mind not being able to edit a micro SD card, then this may be the company for you.

Review.Titre: Premium Service and Premium sabers DX Sabers Rock!!!!
Review.Contenu: Dx Sabers is one of the Best Saber Companies I have come across by far. Excellent response times to all questions I had, very informative when it comes to knowledge of the products being sold. I actually got a chance to meet with the CXO of DX Sabers and we took some pictures together , such a great experience and I will definitely recommend people Shop with DX Sabers!! I will be buying all of my children’s sabers from here

Review.Titre: DXSABERS is by far the best
Review.Contenu: DXSABERS is by far the best. I ordered the crimson maul and it is incredibly beautiful. Well made, the neopixel is fantastic, my favorite saber on any market. Paul is an incredible man, he definitely goes the extra mile. DHL messed up the delivery and lost my order, but Paul sent another straight away and covered the import tax. He is truly amazing!!

Review.Titre: Best Lightsabers. Lifetime warranties. 16 colors AND every saber sound!
Review.Contenu: The reviews for this company are shocking! These guys are INCREDIBLE and have lifetime warranties on their products. I've seen nothing but genuine care and concern for their consumers. They go above and beyond to be there for their clients. I truly hope some bad apple reviews don't stop others from experiencing the phenomenal products these guys create.

I saw them at the Cosmic Con in Flushing Queens, NY.Their products were displayed professionally and were very organized. There was no guess-work in knowing the prices of the items since the prices were displayed very clearly. And I must add that the quality of the sabers and especially the specific types of hilts (handles) were tremendous. They even have exact replica hilts to specific characters. (Luke Skywalker and Darth Vader just to name two)Well worth the investment and the customer service is top notch. I strongly suggest checking out their products.

Review.Titre: Coolest thing I've bought in a while
Review.Contenu: Coolest thing I've bought in a while. Perfect instructions. Easy to operate. Ready to vank some Stormtroopers.

Review.Titre: Stellar Customer Service any Jedi Deserves
Review.Contenu: Customer service with Brianne has been exceptional. They have worked with me on every single occasion where I needed some extra help, and made sure I got my saber in time for May the 4th! Its clear they are willing to go above and beyond to make their customers happy and it has been an absolute pleasure working with Brianne as I've been going through my process of buying my first NeoPixel lightsaber!
Absolutely amazing experience, I bought a light saber for my fiancé an it came packaged wonderfully, as well as shipped out very quickly!! 10/10 would recommend!!!

I purchased the Maul double saber for my little brother and the quality surpassed my expectations! The attention to detail and features were spot on! The DX team kept me updated and informed throughout the entire process! Once your training is complete, I recommend getting a Saber from DX Sabers! I will definitely be buying myself one! Thank you for everything! A+++

DX Sabers is awesome.  Great prices, great customer service.  The top of the blade broke off my some saber.  We met them at a comic con showed it to them no questions asked they replaced it.  Amazing, hard to find warranties that are true to their word but DX Sabers is.  Very impressed.

Review.Titre: Helped me resolve an issue with purchasing
Review.Contenu: Great customer service! Had an issue with purchasing and they were able to help get it resolved. Purchased 3 light sabers from them at Baltimore Comic Con and they work great!Will buy from again!

I stop by the dxsabers booth at tekko 2023. I was hesitant at first at buying the item but after seeing their sabers in action. Seeing how durable they are. Plus the different light and sound optionsThen the biggest thing the LIFETIME warranty Not only did I buy one I bought two and me and my friends have been having so much fun Since we purchase these sabers. And again the lifetime warranty is the best thing about the product but my favorite thing is their durability If you're looking for a saber that is really combat ready This is the product i'm a very heavy handed person so I was thinking they will break easily but me and my friends have a several duels With them and no problems I rarely leave reviews for items but I think dxsabers may have earned themselves a lifetime customer. I will definitely be buying more in the future.

I really love my new sabers! I’ve had Master Replicas, Force Effects, and Ultra Sabers and I have to say these are by far the most durable and have the best features when it comes to colors and sounds. The next feature Im looking to do is make a double saber by buying another blade for my other and I look forward to purchasing that in the future!

Review.Titre: These lightsaber are hands down better…
Review.Contenu: These lightsaber are hands down better and more affordable than what you can find on the market I personally bought a mystery box at cosmic comic con for $100 and got a Saber worth $200. They have incredible customer serivce. Must have if your a star wars fan.

Review.Titre: Flexible people and geeat online customer service
Review.Contenu: I bought a saber from them at Awesome Con, my and my bestie struggled a bit with making the payment to buy 2 mystery sabers but they were really nice and helpful. They take Venmo which was awesome and how we ended up paying for them. I also ended up emailing them because I messed with the saber and messed up the colour for some or the presets and they answered in the same day!

Met the crew at the Garden State Comic Fest at Sussex County Fairground. They had many amazing sabers on sale. They appeared well made and sturdy, with nice weight and felt great!  I purchased a surprise box and received the Fearless Jedi!!!! It is amazing! There was a minor issue of missing screws and customer service responded to my inquiry within an hour! Highly recommended!

Review.Titre: Bought Two Sabers from a booth at Shore…
Review.Contenu: Bought Two Sabers from a booth at Shore Leave 43 Sci-fi Convention in Maryland, The Salesman at the table whom I later learned is the company owner was super friendly. I bought two of the very affordable 99.00 Mystery Saber Box deals. My son and I have played with them very lightly so far so I cant speak to durability. But first impressions are the product seem well built, Sound great and worked well out of the box.

I placed the order before Thanksgiving, and received it the week after. The hilt is beautifully designed, and I could not ask for a better saber. The pictures online does not do the hilts justice. The customer service is phenomenal. Whether it be through email or on Instagram the reply back is almost immediate. This is by far my most favorite saber and I will definitely be making another purchase through them.

Review.Titre: So nice and really awesome products!!!
Review.Contenu: I've had this saber for about a year now and it's really cool!!! I had trouble a little bit ago and their customer service was amazing and so helpful.

Excellent Customer Service. Just placed an order for the Fallen Revan saber. I was having problems with the code for special offer. Contacted customer service after 7pm on a Monday night. Got a response in minutes. Customer service was very helpful. Placed the order. Excited to get the new saber. Have purchased some sabers at a Comic Con convention. These are awesome sabers. Great quality and build. Highly recommend.

Review.Titre: The owner has responded to every…
Review.Contenu: The owner has responded to every question I’ve had within the hour! He is also a super nice guy. Moreover, the product is amazing. The sound, feel, and color has been high quality for the few years I’ve owned it. I would recommend 100% because the quality is unbelievable and the price point beats out the other competitors.

Got a saber from Awsomecon. My kids love it. The craftsmanship and details of the saber are amazing. What we love compare to other vendors that were at the Awsomecon is that they give a lifetime warranty compared to most just giving 1 year. We bought 1 more saber online we can't wait. They also have specials. Highly recommend Thanks guys.

I experienced great customer service with these guys every time ive dealt with them. I picked up my saber at a convention and as long as ive had it its worked amazingly. They even offered to replace the electronics in my blade when i ruined mine using a power adapter that was for something completely different. I chose to purchase and upgrade to a smooth swing instead and install it myself but even then they offered to install the parts for me free of charge. The upgrade was very simple, the sabers are very well designed and these guys are awesome!

The sabers are great if you're looking for something durable and affordable but also want alot of features. The customer service I received from Brianne Sweeny was fantastic. She helped explain things to me and was very responsive!

Amazing family business. Customer service always helped; they answered every email and direct message I sent. Mine is now on the way after getting it fixed FOR FREE! I don’t see myself buying another lightsaber anywhere but here.

The work done on these sabers is amazing. This obviously took a lot of time to do but it’s worth it. A very small company that I suggest actually looking into with amazing customer service as well that tries to stay involved with their customers. I suggest you give them a shot as they are nothing like the bad reviews say they are but understand that at most there are 2 people working on the sabers so be patient. Definitely a 10/5 from me.

I have ordered twice from them, and have been very happy both times. The sabers were all in nice, working condition, as ordered. All my sabers were battle ready, with voices and sounds, contact flashing, and full spectrum beautiful RBG colors. Brianne from customer service is awesome, and they always reply to me fast, and help with anything I need. Best priced sabers, and great quality.

This is technically my second time ordering from DX sabers, but the first time that I was getting something for myself. Customer service as been very attentive and helpful, answering any and all questions. They reached out to me to inform me that the triple stand I had ordered was out of stock, and offered to send a different stand. I did realize that there was something missing from my order when I recieved it, but customer service was quick to reach out when I emailed them. They were very quick to offer solutions. The neopixel mystery saber that I got was absolutely gorgeous and you really can't beat the price I got it at either! Shipping was fast!

Review.Titre: Super high quality and great designs
Review.Contenu: Super high quality and great designs. They are incredibly durable and have a lifetime warranty. Does custom designs and is incredibly passionate. 20/10 would recommend.

100% recommend DXSabers has great quality sabers, with great quality service. If there are any concerns with your order, they are right on it. No reaching out to them and not hearing anything for a while. They get right back to you. I’ll be doing business with them again. You’ll definitely want to do the same.

I am a sword and saber collector. I've owned many sabers that just weren't good enough. More often than not they have the look but not the weaponistic feel I recommend DX sabers to all who are looking for the best saber experience they can find. Awesome craftsmanship great durability.

Review.Titre: I would not buy a saber from anywhere else now that I have found DXsabers.
Review.Contenu: I received my lightsaber yesterday, I opened it today and I genuinely cried. The hilt of my saber was something so incredible, I have seen the replicas other companies sell and truly nothing compares to DX sabers. I am so happy that I was patient, because I now have everything I ever dreamed of. This family works their butts off to give their customers the best service possible & it really shows. I would not buy a saber from anywhere else now that I have found DXsabers.
DXSabers has fantastic customer service. They are quick to reply to email concerns, and leave you knowing just how important you are to them.

Although I don’t own a Saber DX I had an up & personal experience with one & I will tell you I was very excited !! I hope in the near future to own one it would definitely bring a smile to my children’s face !! Thank you Captain A for letting us experience this !!!!

I bought a pretty expensive saber and was a bit worried about the purchase i had some issues when i got it at a con but I emailed the company about my issues and was responded too in minutes. whether it takes a week to fix or a few minutes its clear to me the company stands by there lifetime warranty and i appreciate that.

My friend and I bought a few at momento con! Literally had several battles with each other and a couple other people. So much fun. 💚💚💚 great quality and they were super super nice to deal with 😁😁😁 childhood dreams made
Really like the Saber with all the features and that it feels really sturdy.

Review.Titre: I bought an Inquisitor Grande Sabre for…
Review.Contenu: I bought an Inquisitor Grande Sabre for my son for Christmas. The delivery to me in Australia and follow up from the company was excellent. The sabre itself is impressive and well made. The swing is smooth and the quality and features are first class. The sabre length and hilt design are excellent. I also received a bonus sabre which has proved excellent for our entertainment.

Hello from Turkey! I searched an affordable neopixel saber for days and i found DXSabers. I always dreamed of my first lightsaber but couldnt decide about which one i should get. So i bought a mystery box. I didnt expect something premium for that price of course. But... I GOT A FRICKING LORD VADER REPLICA! And now after a year im finally getting another mystery box and i couldnt be more excited about the results. This man is an honest man about his work. God bless you DXSabers team!
This lightsaber is amazing! I couldn't believe how amazing this product is! It's so durable and fun to use. The features on it are so cool, too! 5 stars!!!

Review.Titre: Quality Sabers with Great Response and Effects
Review.Contenu: The sabers from DXSabers are really well made. The quality of the sabers is evident from the moment they come out of the box. The sounds and the response are incredible and using their sabers are an enjoyable experience.

This is an amazing lightsaber, I love the sounds it makes when you move it around and how it lights up the room, it looks just like the lightsaber in the show. I highly recommend it to people who likes to watch Star Wars, it has very good quality and you won't regret buying it.

It's Luke (Typo: like) youve actually taken an energy into your Hands! You almost can't help but become who you imagine you are when you hold a DXS! Every dream I have that requires me to defend myself, finds me with My Saber in hand! Awesome style, sound, weight and lumens! Never look anywhere but here! #DXS4L

Review.Titre: I have purchased from DX sabers twice…
Review.Contenu: I have purchased from DX sabers twice now. The first time was a bit rocky, but the owner was very helpful and responsive the entire time. I knew that they where going through a difficult time as a company which is why I was willing to give them another chance. Flash forward to now and I must say that I am glad I gave them another chance. Not only did they update me in real time about my order, but the customer service was beyond top notch. They even sent me a video of my order without me even asking for that. I now officially recommend these guys and I will be buying from them again.

Review.Titre: Everything you could want in a lightsaber replica
Review.Contenu: I've always wanted a model lightsaber but never found one worth the price. DX Sabers changed that. These things are amazing. They have every replica you can think of or you can build your own. They are made of real metal, so they feel substantial and real in your hand. There are many colors to switch between,  so you're not just stuck with one. But what really blew my mind was that you can even change the sound effects. Ren's sounds to a normal saber to the dark saber. There is even laser deflection and crossed saber effects. They also play music like the theme and Imperial March!You can tell the owner and designer, Paul is passionate about his work because it shows in the quality. I would highly recommend these if you are a collector, fan, or even a flow artist.

Review.Titre: Owner was very helpful and responsive…
Review.Contenu: Owner was very helpful and responsive the whole way through the shopping, purchasing and shipping. Products are as described and great quality. I got ashokas dual sabers and the look and feel great and all the fun sounds and lights are amazing

Review.Titre: I met the gentlemen of DXSabers at…
Review.Contenu: I met the gentlemen of DXSabers at Galaxycon in Richmond, VA. I bought the last "Fate of Leia" saber from them. This saber looked like a masterpiece! Nice weight, great look, balance and feel! Perfect showpiece for any collector! When found I had some missing screws, I contacted them and they got the parts to me immediately! The service was friendly along with the follow up to make sure I got the parts. A wonderful experience!

Review.Titre: Don't listen to the other reviews
Review.Contenu: I don't know what everyone else here is saying about DX sabers, but they've been fantastic so far. Couldn't name a single issue, my order literally even came 2 days early. I got the luke (which came with an extra baselit as well which I gave to my son) and it was much brighter than I expected, and worked perfectly out of the box. I've been wanting a DX for a while now and they did not disappoint. Compared to the stuff Disney makes at galaxy edge, it's so much better quality and more durable. Will be buying again when I get my paycheck! Stay strong DX 💪

Review.Titre: Great company. We brought my grandson and they were…
Review.Contenu: We brought my grandson and they were amazing with him. They were patient and answered all his questions. He loves the Light Saber.  They go out of their way to ensure everything is just right and stand behind their products. Their customers service can be a role model for other companies large and small.
Met them at Tekko 2023 and purchased a NeoPixel mystery box. I'd never been able to justify buying one before, but it was a sign seeing them at the convention.

Review.Titre: While some concern that I might not…
Review.Contenu: While some concern that I might not receive my order, I did , within six weeks of the order. It came very well packaged and the sabers exceeded expectations. I am extremely pleased with my purchase of the darth mail light dual sabers.

I contacted their customer service to warranty a broken speaker on a saber. They were very responsive and showcased their lifetime warranty, which was very easy to take advantage of. Once they received the saber, their service and communication back was very swift and just what I needed. 10/10 would recommend

Review.Titre: Incredible Sabers and incredible Customer Service!
Review.Contenu: I’ve ordered 2 sabers from DX Sabers, and they are incredible! From the color change, to the voice fonts, and from how durable they are when practicing them in dueling with other sabers, they are so worth it!! I love my Fulcrum and Kenobi Legacy lightsabers!! I truly can’t wait to order more sabers from this company! DX has also been so wonderful in communicating when my sabers will be shipped and if I needed help with anything, they were incredible! I’m so so glad to have found them, and can’t wait to get more sabers from them!

Review.Titre: I got my Saber and was so Happy .
Review.Contenu: I got my Saber and was so happy .. I love it the quality and everything about it .. I would highly recommend them. Since the moment I got in touch with them. They have been on point . Always returning and answering my questions. I spoke with them ,I am the type of person that is always asking questions, and I love how this company started and the mission that started them. Please continue doing what you do and don't allow anyone to take your shine   Continue being attentive and responsible.I'm sending my Jedi fans to go to you .God bless this company and the team ..
They're new shipping speed on ready to go sabers is exactly as advertised.  And they're quality is on par if not better than most of the other well known saber shops but for a fraction of the cost

Review.Titre: y sons met them at a convention and…
Review.Contenu: y sons met them at a convention and…My sons met them at a convention and ordered a buy one get one free lightsaber and had it sent to them. The sabers were sent ahead of time and tracking was delivered to my sons email the next day. He sent me the email and I was like totally shocked that this place was so fast. We got ''em a couple days later and the tracking was active pretty quick too with a day for a delivery. Thanks guys for answering my questions about instructions too. Five stars for ya

Honestly one of the best saber companies I've ever worked with. Wait time is a little slow, but what could you expect when it's basically one man doing all the work. Great customer service and someone I could genuinely call a friend.

Review.Titre: I recently bought my first saber at my…
Review.Contenu: I recently bought my first saber at my local comic con and the experience was absolutely amazing I had a problem a few days later and they got back to me within seconds!

The experience was awesome, at first the lightsaber broke, and the description was a bit confusing, but they backed me up with some awesome customer service, sent me over some new stronger blades, and explained the lightsaber to me! definitely would buy from these guys again.

Very communicative, kept me informed at all stages, and the quality of the sabers was mind blowing. It really feels like having a movie prop in my hand. Was happy to answer all my questions, and also chat fandom. I’ll certainly be sharing DXSabers with my friends here!

Review.Titre: DX Sabers is an amazing brand…
Review.Contenu: DX Sabers is not only an amazing brand but the people are amazing as well. They will go out of their way to make sure their products are safe, fun, and amazing. My son has 2 of the Sabers now and still asks for more. Remember folks these are an Art and this is someones small business. When you shop small you are supporting that person and their driven passion for their art. The owner of this company takes his business seriously and wants all of his customers to enjoy his products. We think you are doing amazing. Keep up the work because we love it!!

Excellent saber and great feel. Felt like a kid when I got it as I always wanted to know what it could be like owning what real saber would feel like instead of the plastics I got as a kid. Brianne was very helpful in emails ensuring I got my saber as quick as possible and made me feel that I was a customer and not an order number. I can't wait when I get my home to mount this on my wall.

This is my second online order from DX Sabers.  The Twin classic Tano sabers I got my wife for her birthday was amazing.  So, this year I ordered neopixel upgrade for her Rose Gold saber, (we picked it up at C2E2 when we met DX Sabers), for Christmas.  I requested to have it before Christmas, and as they promised, I have received it.  It's going to be a amazing upgrade.

Review.Titre: Not a paid review or someone who works…
Review.Contenu: Not a paid review or someone who works for DX, just an honest experience.  Ordered their starkiller saber on August 18th and it shipped a few days later.  Was delivered today 8/27.  Not a bad experience at all.

Review.Titre: Ashoka Past Pair and Dark Rose
Review.Contenu: Ordered my wife the Ashoka Past Pair. When they arrived, they ignited perfectly.  Loved the color changes, great quality.  Then when we saw them at C2E2, we brought the Dark Rose and Imperial Sabers (hope I got the name right).  Imperial Sabers joined together to make a fun staff. Great sabers, had a lot of fun battling with them.  Definitely battled ready and tested.

Dxsaber are absolutely amazing. Wonderful, friendly, and super helpful. They went out of their way to make sure my son got the saber of his dreams. Amazing family of jedi and a wonderful small business to support. #shopsmall

I can not say enough great things about Dxsabers. The quality of the sabers are incredible, the blades are durable and the hilts are a great quality metal. The sound effects are authentic, and the variety of colours allows you to feel like a Jedi or Sith or anything in between. I should also mention I had a slight issue with my order so I promptly reached out to them to check in. I can safely say they wanted to do everything they could to make the situation right and they did just that. They have amazing customer service and I would not hesitate to reach out to them again.If your considering purchasing a saber, I highly recommend Dxsabers. You will get an excellent saber in return for a great price that is ready for display or combat.

DxSabers is dialed into their consumer base and know how to cater to their customers while still keeping their prices low. The attention to detail on their product AND their service is what sets them apart. I will be going back very soon!

I bought the Reva’s Revenge staff or double saber. I let them know there was a minor issue with one of the sabers. They literally sent me a replacement without a blink! And fast!!  I didn’t have to argue or debate at all. Their customer service was beyond what I would have expected. I Will absolutely buy from them again!!
This was my first experience purchasing a lightsabor and I couldn’t be happier! My Mara Jade replica is gorgeous! I’m not sure who squealed loudest when we first lit it up, me or my kids.

They have an amazing team who really do care for the products they're making. Always going above and beyond to provide excellent customer experience. The quality and finish of the sabers they sell are astonishing!
